Articles.Content:
Anyone else getting the camera jumping around like crazy when EVA-ing? I can't upload a video right now, I'll try to add one later tonight.

KSP 1.1.1 64bit on Windows 8.1, no mods.

Edit: OK, home now so here's a video. To make it easier to test, I did use HyperEdit to place the station in a 100km orbit this time. But no other mods, and no clipping or anything building the test station.

So that's two different PCs I was able to reproduce this on.

Edited April 28, 2016 by MalevolentNinja
Just checked, no problems with it here.

I had it in 1.1 at least, but only when one of my kerbals fell over, during the getting up animation. It'd start shaking all over the place, clipping through the ground, until the animation was complete.

Well there was a bit in the change logs about changing the way it handles com calculation in orbit to prevent ap/pe jumping around. Perhaps it's not applying that fix to the camera so it now jumps around instead in your case? I suggest logging a bug.
